snippet: Bo Guagua, 24, made his most explicit defense of Bo Xilai, a former Communist Party official in China, since a sordid political scandal involving the entire Bo family broke in the spring.
abstract: Bo Guagua, youngest son of former Chinese Communist Party leader Bo Xilai, posts statement on Tumblr defending his father as 'upright in his beliefs and devoted to duty'.
lead_paragraph: Bo Guagua, 24, made his most explicit defense of Bo Xilai, a former Communist Party official in China, since a sordid political scandal involving the entire Bo family broke in the spring.

headline.seo: Bo Xilai’s Son Defends Him as Upright and Devoted
headline.main: Disgraced Chinese Official’s Son Defends Him
headline.print_headline: Son Defends Bo Xilai As Upright In Beliefs
